heading.headline: This is
heading.title: Marco D. Cellamare
heading.subtitle: Senior Full-Stack Developer and Digital Designer

content.leading: Over 20 years of experience as a Full-Stack Developer and Digital Designer, specializing in Front-End Development and creating scalable web applications with intuitive Web / UI design.
paragraphs: Focused on modern front-end frameworks, responsive interfaces, user-centered design systems, and industry-standard coding patterns and best practices. Based in Copenhagen, originally from Italy — fluent in Italian and English (and a little Danish).
Tech Stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Tailwindcss, Daisy UI, Vite, React Router, i18next, Phaser.js, Framer Motion, Howler, PHP, MySQL, SCORM, Google Maps API, Firebase.
list: Built and maintained a high-performance data dashboard for internal analytics, enabling real-time visualization of over 1,000,000 records (and growing) across map and table views. Reduced manual data processing time by approximately 80%.

Architected a custom LMS platform with a real-time SCORM-like tracking framework for collecting detailed user interaction statistics across learning modules. Enabled deep behavioral analytics and reporting beyond standard LMS capabilities, supporting compliance and performance evaluations at scale.

Developed SCORM-compliant e-learning modules and serious games—such as “Who Wants to Be a Millionaire” and “Space Invaders” clones, as well as custom point-and-click experiences—using React and TypeScript. Each module was fully customizable to match client branding and deployed to over 50,000 users in cybersecurity awareness campaigns, significantly boosting engagement and completion tracking.
Collaborated cross-functionally with instructional designers, product managers, and stakeholders to align technical implementation with business goals and regulatory standards.
Ensured secure development practices, performance optimization, and maintainability across all applications.

paragraphs: Tech Stack: JavaScript, React, jQuery, Cordova, PHP, MySQL, Firebase, MobilePay API, SumUp API, Windcave API, Zebra API, Joomla Framework.
list: Developed and maintained a cross-platform mobile app for BAT UK, used by 100+ field agents to manage sales, payments, and reporting. Integrated SumUp and Zebra APIs for seamless transactions and on-site receipt printing, reducing manual entry and improving transaction speed by over 60%.

Built a cross-platform Android/iOS gift suggestion and anniversary tracking app, reaching over 5,000 users. Delivered personalized reminders and integrated MobilePay for instant gifting. Increased user engagement by 40% through tailored content and cross-platform availability.

Created a support request WebApp for Volvo, used across multiple regions, that connected users to the nearest assistance center in real time. Helped reduce average customer response time by 30–40%, streamlining support workflows and improving user satisfaction.

Delivered a local business discovery WebApp during the Covid-19 lockdown, helping 200+ small businesses stay visible and accessible. The platform attracted over 5,000 local users in the first three months, supporting recovery during a critical period, promoted by the Danish national TV.
Designed and developed several custom websites and WebApps for a wide range of clients, using responsive layouts, CMS integration, and brand-aligned design systems.
Developed over 200 websites and web applications for national and enterprise clients in retail, sports, and corporate sectors.

Built online contests with prize incentives for various clients, delivered as games (e.g., a Flappy Bird clone using Phaser.js) or interactive experiences. Demonstrated strong proficiency in game development, physics-based mechanics, and responsive gameplay design.
Delivered marketing platforms, custom CMS solutions, and interactive tools with a focus on fast load times (under 2s), WCAG-compliant accessibility, and brand-aligned UI.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams (design, content, dev) to build scalable, maintainable codebases, consistently delivering projects under 6–8 week timelines while meeting performance and UX standards.
Delivered hundreds of responsive, SEO-optimized websites for small to medium businesses across various industries. Included CMS integration, e-commerce, and brand-aligned design.
Collaborated with clients and designers for high-quality execution.
